# init(style:)

**Initializer**

Creates an impact feedback generator with the specified style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(style: UIImpactFeedbackGenerator.FeedbackStyle)
```

## Parameters

- **style**: A value representing the mass of the colliding objects. For a list of valid feedback styles, see the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImpactFeedbackGenerator/FeedbackStyle] enumeration.

## Return Value

A newly initialized feedback generator.

## Discussion

For more information on using feedback generators, see `Using feedback generators`.
title: init(style:)
